title: Perfect Replacement Lid
body: My dog stole my original thru-lid off the counter and chewed it up. This replacement did the trick and fit like a charm. The only discernible difference from the original is my wallet missing a few extra dollars from having to buy this one.

title: Fits nicely and looks great
body: The original lid got stepped on and had a giant crack. It really detracted from the look of the coffeemaker. This replacement fits perfectly and has a nice dark black sheen to it that spruces up the whole machine.
author: marshaka
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 28 de septiembre de 2020

title: Keeps coffee a little warmer
body: This gadget is for a Moccamaster coffee maker. It is helpful in keeping the coffee in the carafe hot if you are not around to immediately put the lid on as soon as the brewing is done. If on the other hand you can cap the carafe after the last drip, you will not see much benefit from this device. I had my coffee maker for several years before acquiring this and never knew I needed it.
author: Croce
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 11 de diciembre de 2014

title: Waste of money for
body: under whelmed with this product. Can't see where it makes much difference in keeping coffee warmer longer. Waste of money for me
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 31 de mayo de 2015

title: I wish the carafe came with this lid; I am glad I found it.
body:
This lid is great. I wish I had it years ago. Fortunately, I lost the top that came with the carafe. It required that you remove the lid while brewing and then screw it on after the brewing was completed.
This new lid allows the coffee to brew through it. While it does help to keep the coffee warm, there is some cooling over time because of the opening. So you have to pour your coffee within a half hour or so of brewing to have a warm cup. With the screw top lid, the coffee stayed warm in the carafe for literally hours.
The lid makes it easy to pour from the carafe. It is much easier than if the lid were not in the carafe.
I would have given five stars but for the loss of warmth of the coffee. I think it it worth the tradeoff for what you gain with this lid though.
author: Purple Knight
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 6 de marzo de 2017
